modName: Manny The Mammoth - Animal Follower - DELETED
summary: Manny The Mammoth is an undergrown mammoth who wants in on your adventures.
descriptionHtml:
[center][line]
[img]https://scontent-a-sjc.xx.fbcdn.net/hphotos-frc1/t1.0-9/1926670_10152402938794189_6948887723605270470_n.jpg[/img]
[line]
The Place Beyond The Pines
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52628/?]Nexus Download Link[/url]
[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/thumbnails/52628-3-1396643081.jpg[/img]
Unique Follower - Natalie
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52835/?]Nexus Download Link[/url]
[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/thumbnails/52835-1-1397064504.jpg[/img]
[line]
[img]https://scontent-a-sjc.xx.fbcdn.net/hphotos-ash3/t1.0-9/10294373_10152402941704189_6137391144572516402_n.jpg[/img]
[line]
Manny The Mammoth adds an "undergrown" little mammoth to your game who cant wait to join you on your adventures throughout skyrim however his parents dont really like the idea of him wondering off with the dragonborn so your going to have to try get him away from his home first. He is a tough little guy who will have your back no matter who you are facing, watch the little lard ball charge and headbutt your enemies into oblivion. He can be found at the "Sleeping Tree Camp" with his family.
[line]
[img]https://scontent-a-sjc.xx.fbcdn.net/hphotos-prn2/t1.0-9/10270824_10152402965709189_6646931807125246817_n.jpg[/img]
[line]
I suggest using NMM for easy installion and so if you wanted to remove the mod it can be easily removed otherwise if you wanted to install manually then copy the included .esp and the scripts folder into your skyrim data folder.
[line]
[img]https://scontent-b-sjc.xx.fbcdn.net/hphotos-prn2/t1.0-9/10291794_10152402965374189_2040155054134122673_n.jpg[/img]
[line]
Simply deactivate the mod in NMM or delete the .esp.
[line][/center]
author: HarrisModifications
